author: Ray Sanchez, CNN
title: Harvard study finds institutional racism 'permeates' the Massachusetts justice system
description: Blacks and Latinos sent to prison in Massachusetts get longer sentences than their White counterparts, says a report by Harvard Law School researchers. They're also more likely than White people to get arrested and convicted on drug, weapons charges.
